segments.text: Unidas en Ginebra y Presidenta Relatora del Grupo de Trabajo para la presentaci√≥n del
segments.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segments.text: Excelencia, querida Embajadora, tiene la palabra.
segments.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segments.text: Thank you, Chairperson, Excellencies, Ladies and Gentlemen.
segments.speaker: SPEAKER_00

segments.text: I'm pleased to introduce the report of the 19th session of the Intergovernmental Working Group
segments.speaker: SPEAKER_00

segments.text: on the effective implementation of the Durban Declaration and Programme of Action.
